data.field:
Contents of CGI

[perlman:lib:CGI|CGI]
Simple Common Gateway Interface Class
[perlman:CGI::Apache|Apache]
Make things work with CGI.pm against Perl-Apache API
[perlman:CGI::Carp|Carp]
CGI routines for writing to the HTTPD (or other) error log
[perlman:CGI::Cookie|Cookie]
Interface to Netscape Cookies
[perlman:CGI::Fast|Fast]
CGI Interface for Fast CGI
[perlman:CGI::Push|Push]
Simple Interface to Server Push
[perlman:CGI::Switch|Switch]
Try more than one constructors and return the first object available
